name: In re District Justice Raymond E. TUBBS Magisterial District 10-2-09 Westmoreland County, Pennsylvania

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, PAPADAKOS, and CAPPY, JJ.
LARSEN, J., and ZAPPALA, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: In re District Justice Raymond E. TUBBS Magisterial District 10-2-09 Westmoreland County, Pennsylvania.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Respondent, Raymond E. Tubbs, having resigned from office on January 9,1990, it is ORDERED that he is forever barred from judicial office in the Commonwealth.
LARSEN, J., and ZAPPALA, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Thomas R. Ceraso, Greensburg, for respondent.
Robert L. Keuch, Executive Director, for J.I.R.B.
casebody.head_matter:
604 A.2d 246
In re District Justice Raymond E. TUBBS Magisterial District 10-2-09 Westmoreland County, Pennsylvania.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Sept. 27, 1990.
Decided March 5, 1992.
Thomas R. Ceraso, Greensburg, for respondent.
Robert L. Keuch, Executive Director, for J.I.R.B.
Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, PAPADAKOS, and CAPPY, JJ.
